articles.author: Ricky O'Donnell
articles.title: Texas A&M vs. Troy: Upset ruined by officiating in women’s March Madness - SB Nation
articles.description: Troy almost had the first win for a No. 15 seed in women’s NCAA tournament history, but questionable calls from the officials cost them their chance.
articles.content: A No. 15 seed had never beaten a No. 2 seed in the history of the womens NCAA tournament. The Troy Trojans almost made it happen on Monday in their opening round matchup against Texas A&M, but so… [+1977 chars]
